content: - 3 -   way bank products and services are delivered.  We value the CRA’s role in meeting the   credit needs of low- and moderate-income neighborhoods and want to be very careful   that any revisions serve to strengthen the CRA’s purpose.    I commend your dedication to ensuring that all Americans have fair access to the   economic opportunities that our nation offers.  I hope you have a productive conference,   and I look forward to our ongoing conversation about how the Federal Reserve can help.
